titleStmt.title: A philosophicall discourse, entituled, The anatomie of the minde. Nevvlie made and set forth by T.R.
titleStmt.author: Rogers, Thomas, d. 1616.

publicationStmt.publisher: By I[ohn] C[harlewood] for Andrew Maunsell, dvvelling in Paules Church yarde, at the signe of the Parret,

notesStmt.note: Includes index and a final errata leaf.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
